title: HostSlick
author: HostSlick
content: https://hostslick.com/logo.pngWhy Choose HostSlick?HostSlick aims to deliver high-quality servers without the hefty price tag. We take pride in providing a seamless hosting experience backed by our own infrastructure in the Netherlands. Unlike many, we're not resellers. From the core router to the servers, we own and manage everything.Benefits of HostSlick: Accepts a wide variety of payment methods. Advanced 2Tbit custom DDoS protection with every dedicated server. Our own infrastructure in the Netherlands ensures reliability. Unique Cloud/TwinDC setup connecting two datacenters, offering unparalleled performance. Rely on a professional team, not amateurs. Powered by industry-leading Juniper & Cisco equipment. Premium server hardware from Dell, Supermicro, and HP Enterprise. Dedicated 24x7 on-site support and monitoring. Announce your IP range for free on our Cisco Router and ASN. Transparent pricing with no hidden costs or bandwidth overcharges.Visit our website for the latest in-stock servers ready for instant setup!Our Dedicated Server Offerings:Dedicated Server Xeon
